org.spongepowered.api.event

Class SpongeEventFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spongepowered.api.event.SpongeEventFactory

  • public final class SpongeEventFactory
extends Object
    Generates Sponge event implementations.

    • Method Detail

      • addEventFactoryPlugin

        public static void addEventFactoryPlugin(EventFactoryPlugin plugin)
        Adds an EventFactoryPlugin to the chain of plugins.

        The plugin chain is in LIFO order.

        Parameters:
        plugin - The EventFactoryPlugin to add to the chain

      • createEvent

        public static <T> T createEvent(Class<T> type,
                                Map<String,Object> values)
        Creates an event class from an interface and a map of property names to values.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of event to be created
        Parameters:
        type - The event interface to generate a class for
        values - The map of property names to values
        Returns:
        The generated event class.

        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the state event
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • createBlockBreak

        public static BlockBreakEvent createBlockBreak(Game game,
                                               Cause cause,
                                               Location<World> location,
                                               BlockSnapshot replacementBlock,
                                               int exp)
        Creates a new BlockBreakEvent.
        Parameters:
        game - The game instance for this GameEvent
        cause - The cause of the event, can be null
        location - The location
        replacementBlock - The block that will replace the existing block
        exp - The experience to give, or take for negative values
        Returns:
        A new instance of the event

        Creates a new GameRuleChangeEvent.

        game - The game instance for this GameEvent
        world - The world involved in this event
        name - The name of the game rule
        oldValue - The previous value for the rule
        newValue - The new value for the rule
        Returns:
        A new instance of the event
